mapper.select:
SELECT E.EQM_ID AS EQM_ID, E.EQM_NAME AS EQM_NAME, E.CHCK_PERD AS CHCK_PERD, E.USE_YN AS USE_YN, P.PRCS_ID AS PRCS_ID, P.NM AS NM
FROM EQM E LEFT OUTER JOIN PRCS P ON (E.EQM_ID = P.EQM_ID)
AND E.FG = F_COM_NM_TO_CODE(#{gubun})
AND USE_YN = #{eqmNonYn}
ORDER BY E.EQM_ID
SELECT A.*, E.EQM_NAME FROM ( SELECT O.*, R.RESN_NAME FROM EQM_NON_OPR O, EQM_NON_OPR_RESN R WHERE O.RESN_ID = R.RESN_ID ) A, EQM E
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'EQMF-'|| TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD-')|| LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(EQM_NON_OPR_ID, -3))),0) +1, 3, 0) AS EQM_NON_OPR_ID FROM EQM_NON_OPR WHERE SUBSTR(EQM_NON_OPR_ID,-12,8) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
INSERT INTO EQM_NON_OPR( EQM_NON_OPR_ID, EQM_ID, NON_OPR_FR_TM, REMK, NON_OPR_TO_TM, RESN_ID ) VALUES( #{eqmNonOprId}, #{eqmId}, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyyMMdd')||#{nonOprFrTm},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), #{remk}, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyyMMdd')||#{nonOprToTm},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), #{resnId} )
